languages.text: "А в этом месте можно сделать что-то, за что тебя не захочет убить еще больше ксеносов, а? А, точно. Умереть".
"Can we do anything in this place without making even more xenos want to kill us? Oh, yeah, that's right — die."
languages.original_text: "А в этом месте можно сделать что-то, за что тебя не захочет убить еще больше ксеносов, а? А, точно. Умереть".

traits.locale_text: "Can we do anything in this place without making even more xenos want to kill us? Oh, yeah, that's right — die."
"Can we do anything in this place without making even more xenos want to kill us? Oh, yeah, that's right — die."
"Can we do anything in this place without making even more xenos want to kill us? Oh, yeah, that's right — die."
"Can we do anything in this place without making even more xenos want to kill us? Oh, yeah, that's right — die."

languages.text: “在这种地方，如果不能激起更多异形的杀心，我们还能做什么呢？噢，没错，还有一件事情可做，那就是去死。”
languages.original_text: "Can we do anything in this place without making even more xenos want to kill us? Oh, yeah, that's right — die."

traits.locale_text: “在这种地方，如果不能激起更多异形的杀心，我们还能做什么呢？噢，没错，还有一件事情可做，那就是去死。”

languages.text: « J'ai l'impression que de toute façon, quoi qu'on fasse, on fera que s'attirer les foudres de plus de xénos. À part mourir, éventuellement. »
languages.original_text: "Can we do anything in this place without making even more xenos want to kill us? Oh, yeah, that's right — die."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai l'impression que de toute façon, quoi qu'on fasse, on fera que s'attirer les foudres de plus de xénos. À part mourir, éventuellement. »

languages.text: «¿Hay algo que podamos hacer en este lugar sin que más xenos quieran matarnos? Aparte de morir, digo».
languages.original_text: "Can we do anything in this place without making even more xenos want to kill us? Oh, yeah, that's right — die."

traits.locale_text: «¿Hay algo que podamos hacer en este lugar sin que más xenos quieran matarnos? Aparte de morir, digo».

languages.text: 「こんな場所よ、大勢の異種族は私たちを殺したがってるに決まってるじゃない。ああ、そうね、そのとおりよ…死ぬしかない」
languages.original_text: "Can we do anything in this place without making even more xenos want to kill us? Oh, yeah, that's right — die."

traits.locale_text: 「こんな場所よ、大勢の異種族は私たちを殺したがってるに決まってるじゃない。ああ、そうね、そのとおりよ…死ぬしかない」

languages.text: "Können wir hier überhaupt irgendetwas tun, ohne dass uns dafür noch mehr Xenos töten wollen? Ach ja, stimmt ... sterben."
languages.original_text: "Can we do anything in this place without making even more xenos want to kill us? Oh, yeah, that's right — die."

traits.locale_text: "Können wir hier überhaupt irgendetwas tun, ohne dass uns dafür noch mehr Xenos töten wollen? Ach ja, stimmt ... sterben."

languages.original_text: "Can we do anything in this place without making even more xenos want to kill us? Oh, yeah, that's right — die."

languages.text: "Burada daha fazla zenonun bizi öldürmek istemesine sebep olmayacak bir şey yapamayacak mıyız biz? Gerçi doğru, ölebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Can we do anything in this place without making even more xenos want to kill us? Oh, yeah, that's right — die."

traits.locale_text: "Burada daha fazla zenonun bizi öldürmek istemesine sebep olmayacak bir şey yapamayacak mıyız biz? Doğru, ölebiliriz tabii."
